augmentedStrong.references: Matt.8.17 Luke.5.15 Luke.8.2 John.11.4 Acts.28.9 Gal.4.13 1Tim.5.23

vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
ἀσθέν-εια, ἡ,
want of strength, weakness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; especially feebleness, sickliness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 disease, sickness, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; δι᾽ ἀσθένειαν[NT]
__3 ἀ. βίου poverty, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__4 in moral sense, feebleness, weakness, τῆς ἀνθρωπίνης φύσεως[Refs 5th c.BC+] to be weak, feeble, sickly, ἀ. μέλη to be weak in limb, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἀ. ἀσθένειαν [NT+5th c.BC+]; ἠσθένησε he fell sick, [Refs 4th c.BC+]sick man, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἠσθενηκότα[Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__2 to be needy, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἠσθενηκότες, of those unable to pay taxes, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__3 with infinitive, to be too weak to do a thing, not to be able.., [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__4 decline, ἠσθένησεν ἡ ἡμέρα εἰς τὴν ἑσπέραν[LXX]
vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G0769G', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθένεια', 'stepTransliteration': 'astheneia', 'gloss': 'weakness: weak', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'debilidad', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0769H', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθένεια', 'stepTransliteration': 'astheneia', 'gloss': 'weakness: ill', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'debilidad', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0772G', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενής', 'stepTransliteration': 'asthenēs', 'gloss': 'weak', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0772H', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενής', 'stepTransliteration': 'asthenēs', 'gloss': 'weak: ill', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
weakness, illness, infirmity
want of strength, weakness, feebleness 1Cor. 15:43; bodily infirmity, illness, state of ill health, sickness, Mt. 8:17; Lk. 5:15; metaphorically infirmity, frailty, imperfection, intellectual and moral, Rom. 6:19; 1Cor. 2:3; Heb. 5:2; 7:28; suffering, affliction, distress, calamity, Rom. 8:26
vocabinfos._es_Definition: debilidad (de cualquier tipo) ; enfermedad ; un espíritu que causa enfermedad (LUC.13:11) ;
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 疾病
2) (沒有能力或缺乏經驗) 軟弱
3) (缺乏自信或自覺不足) 軟弱 #羅 6:19; 來 4:15|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 疾病
2) (没有能力或缺乏经验) 软弱
3) (缺乏自信或自觉不足) 软弱 #罗 6:19; 来 4:15|
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: sự yếu đau; bịnh; bệnh, căn bệnh
